title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected behavior: When selecting an item in the library outline view, it should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
